definition: letter/mail/CL:封[feng1]/to trust/to believe/to profess faith in/truthful/confidence/trust/at will/at random
a step/a pace/walk/march/stages in a process/situation

sentences.english: He breezed up to the police officer and asked for directions.
sentences.chinese: 他信步走到警官跟前问路。

sentences.english: I strolled into the village, and perceived that it was a town.
sentences.chinese: 我信步在那村子里走着，我发现那是个城。

sentences.english: In Africa you can't walk in the countryside and think.
sentences.chinese: 在非洲，你没法信步闲庭似的走在乡间排遣思绪。

sentences.english: Dropped in at National Library to see the National Book Exhibition which will close today.
sentences.chinese: 喰信步走到图书馆看即将在今天结束的全国书籍。

sentences.english: Being with you is like whasking on an extremely clear morning.
sentences.chinese: 和你在一起就像在一个清晰的朝晨信步。

sentences.english: The thing stepped through the wall of fire.
Strolling along the boulevard, one feels as if the West Lake were wakening in dawn mist.
sentences.chinese: 信步长堤，仿若西湖从雾霭中刚睡醒似的。

sentences.english: I sauntered through the rooms, following the inquisitive ladies of distinction.
sentences.chinese: 我信步随着好奇的贵妇们穿过几个房间。

sentences.english: At five minutes to eleven he sauntered up to Marie's booth.
sentences.chinese: 十一点差五分，他信步走进了玛丽的小篷子里。

sentences.english: He toddled down to the office.
Six Shis thousand have no antistrophic auditorium, direct autumn He house, take a promenade to go amenable.
sentences.chinese: 陆莳千没有回舞厅，直接出了秋赫家，信步往前走着。

sentences.english: People don't come here to play it safe. They come here to swim in the deep end.
sentences.chinese: 在这里的人们不会闲庭信步，他们到这里击水三千。

sentences.english: After a long rest on the bench we moseyed up to the museum.
sentences.chinese: 我们在长凳上休息了许久之后便信步向博物馆走去。

sentences.english: He was not acquainted with Arras, the streets were dark, and he walked on at random.
sentences.chinese: 他从前没有到过阿拉斯，街上一片漆黑，他信步走去。

sentences.english: She trod casually, enjoying the touch of the damp grass on her feet.
sentences.chinese: 她信步而行，享受着湿漉漉的草地触及双脚的感觉。

definition: with one's hands clasped behind one's back
promenade/long hallway/Long Corridor in the Summer Palace, Beijing 北京頤和園|北京颐和园[Bei3 jing1 Yi2 he2 yuan2]
